root: ^Once House Cherry Blossom attacked, I came searching for you.
^I didn't know where you had gone.
^I thought I might have lost you.
^I dread to say that that outcome was not far off.
^I am lucky to have my life.
^I have not known you long, but in that time I have grown to greatly admire your wit.
^You speak with poise and act in good morals.
^I am proud to have been a part of your army.
^I do not wish to be a part of your army anymore.
^I wish to be a part of your life.
^I have been moved by your presence and your honor.
^I have grown to crave those moments we have together.
^My life- I hardly feel like I've ever had a plan.
^But you, it's like you always know what to do.
^I know, but it's that drive to fight every day with vigor.
^And I'm tired of living my life without a plan, so I came up with one of my own.
^I will live the rest of my life with you.
^It just requires one thing on your part.
^When you go to House Cherry Blossom, do not die.
^I would request to accompany you but-
^But if I cannot go with you,
^I demand that you take care of yourself. And come back safely.
^After all, I have something worth coming back to now.
